title: Establishes the Bloomberg waiver for candidates in compliance with N.Y. cities campaign finance board regulations
summary: Establishes the Bloomberg waiver for candidates in compliance with NYC's campaign finance board regulations regarding a voluntary personal spending limit; failure to set a voluntary limit waives the existing limitations on an opposing publicly funded candidate.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to fair competition for publicly financed candidates by establishing the Bloomberg waiver
